name: The Gayest Succubus
description:
Guide the Gayest Succubus on her quest to save the Loneliest Lesbian from the clutches of a night alone! Download now to experience the following:

  • 10 levels of hopping action!
  • Beautiful sprites with up to four colours!
  • The highscore table is a little risqué, but nothing's showing so it should be fine!
  • Sound!

CONTROLS:
Arrow Keys: Move
Space: Jump/Yes
